attributes.action: Increase the amount of money people get on benefits
attributes.background: Considering that the economy is going up people on benefits aren't getting enough money to survive. gas, electric,rent,tax are becoming more expensive and the benefits payments are staying the same so I purpose we change that and give more to the people who need it

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly how much you would like benefits to increase by, or which benefits you mean.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
